name: Easy Digital Downloads – Custom Favicon
author: kprajapati22

sections.description:
Adds a Custom updated favicon to Easy Digital Downloads. Displays how many items are in your cart in the favicon just like Gmail!. You can also use different customization for number of items in cart

Features

  • Add a custom favicon
  • Display number of items added in cart
  • Text color, Background color, different styles and animation features
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file
  2. Upload the included folder to ‘/wp-content/plugins’ directory of your WordPress installation
  3. Activate the plugin via the WordPress Plugins page
  4. Now, You will see settings link on plugin page. Click on it then you wil redirect to the settings page of plugin.

  • Tested with Easy Digital Downloads 3.1.2

Version 1.0.1 – 28/01/2018

  • Tested with WordPress 4.9.2 and Easy Digital Downloads 2.8.17

Version 1.0.0 – 06/01/2015
